content.detailedDescription:
This was a saturday sept. 23, 2017.  i was enjoying the day but also not happy about all the jet "trails" and began taking pictures of those "trails" as they began to haze up the sky on an otherwise beautifully clear and bright blue sky day.

looking through a few of my pics i saw the orb.

i thought the object i captured was a planet or certainly a fast orbiting/or moving comet/meteor although i have seen many before and this did not have a tail or a fuzzy edge etc.

i was dumbfounded and immediately contacted some friends with whom i have had many discussions with....One i have witnessed a ufo sighting with.  i was pretty "hyped" up for many hours after seeing this thing...It was huge and certainly not venus or .....

i was able to capture three good pics...Meaning the object appears in all three pics with movement sse to ssw moving across the sky...Across the sun then i honestly could not take my eyes off the first pic after discovering it....By then i was unable to find it/capture it again.  i would say the whole "passing" time took just a few minutes....10-15 at the very most.
content.summary: Appeared to be a "planet" or large comet???  quite startling

content.detailedDescription:
I get up around this time most mornings to go have a cigarette.
our back door faces due south.
i always look up at the sky to see if i can see stars.
i looked directly to the south sky and noticed what i thought at first was an airplane with the blinking red light on it. other stars were visible and bright.
so i am looking at this "airplane" when it divides its singular light into two. i was thinking boy "you need to get your eyes checked".
there is always a bright star in that same area that i look at, yet this one was not it.
so i brush it off as an "airplane" when i look around more to the west and see another double light.These two sets of blinking lights mimicked a straight line turned north west.
at this time i was getting a bit nervous because i have followed stories, watched movies on ufo's and other beings. 
in my mind i was trying to brush it off "i didn't want to get abducted".
i kept thinking so i turned due west as i always due when putting out my cigarette when i noticed another set of these blinking double lights.
this last set of lights where in the direction of west, north west. 
i put the dimensions into perspective to see a triangle shape with a lot of space in between. i am certain that it was transparent. this area being open helps with the mindset that i didn't just see what i thought i saw.
i didn't get photos or video, i am to scared to go back outside.
this happened 1 hour ago.
your form made me choose a duration of time starting at 1 hour, this experience only lasted 7 minutes for me.
please contact me with any questions comments or concerns you may have.
thank you for your time.
i am a full believer now.
content.summary: Looked up saw one set of lights thought it was an airplane - than another and another.

content.detailedDescription:
Two o'clock afternoon driving west on interstate 30 just west of downtown ft worth. just south of joint fighter base, the old carswell afb. saw a blackish greenish plane flying low just above trees to nw. it was flying too slow and low for a normal plane. i watched it for a good 30 sec trying to figure out what it was when it went behind a 15 story building. it reappeared west of building after 10 sec just north of interest 30 approximately 500' above ground. i was focused on it looking for details. no cockpit window or windows at all. i had view of port side which had three rectangle type picture frame outlines down the side. it had a tail section that would be the rudder part but didn't see any wing structures on tail or otherwise. maybe it was too low or my angle for me to see them? then, it stopped in mid air in place for about a three count. then rotated 90 degrees, in place on it's tail so now it's like a rocket on launch pad. hung there for another three count then took off straight up and within one body length of itself vanished. just disappeared. no sound, no con trail, nothing. my mouth dropped open and i started looking at other cars and driver's seeing if anyone else was looking up like me. 
the whole time the plane was lightly shaking like two magnets do when you put common poles facing each other.

later i talked to an flight instructor at the base, he is also an x air force 1 pilot. i saw his air force 1 license. i told him my story and he told me to look up the aurora. i did and the pic is close but not correct with what i saw. i spoke with him again and told him the pic is not correct. he pulled it up on his phone and we looked at it. i told him like the pic there was no cockpit window. he said because it's a drown because it travels mock 10 humans can't handle it. i pointed out the pic didn't have the rectangle frames on the side. he said they were on the other side. which would work because the pic was of the starboard side. i ask him what the engine was and he said he didn't know. i said i thought it was magnetic of some sort because the way it shimmered and the moves it made. he looked at me like i was either a total idiot or i guessed it, i don't know?
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Aurora plane, moved too slow to stay in the air. came to a stop, rotated 90 deg in place, sat motionless like rocket on launch pad for 3 count then went straight up and vanished instantly.

content.detailedDescription: Object after object, glowing, like airplanes, no flashing lights. there was an airplane at one point but it was on it's normal route to phl.
content.summary: Yeah i have no idea.

content.detailedDescription: I was on a cruise ship, we were returning from st kitts to ft lauderdale. i went out on the balcony which i did every night. i first noticed the object cause i thought it was a falling star or meteor. the object came from the northeast, stopped, did several different moves and turns, stopped again, and then took off over the ship going southwest. the object looked opaque, glowing, orb or circle. i watched it the entire time, not believing what i was seeing, but i had saw one similar 2 months earlier in michigan. i went inside our cabin and told my husband what happened. actually made me a little scared, this is the 3rd time i have seen a ufo and made me worry why i was seeing them so often. the object ended flying away very, very, fast over the ship and disappeared.
content.summary: Was on a cruise ship coming back to florida from st kitts. was out on the balcony, first thought it was a falling star, but it stopped, did several turns, hovered, then took off over the ship

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was at nationals park and during the national anthem, a bright green light went across the sky and was gone really quickly. i thought it was a plane at first, but planes move too slowly. the light was just above the scoreboard as i watched the national anthem be played and this cought my attention and darted across the sky. the light disappeared within 2 seconds or so. the only other thing that it could be would be a laser pointer, but a laser pointer of that high power would not be allowed in the park. so the only thing left would be a ufo.
content.summary: Short bright light shoit out of sky then despaired

content.detailedDescription: I was watching tv in my midtown apartment (7:30pm dark outside) when i looked out the window & thought i saw a shooting star. i quickly noticed it wasn't a shooting star after seeing several other brightly lit objects darting around the same part of the sky. they lit up and dimmed the way fireflies do, but they swirled and changed directions like birds circling. even when they were dark i could still see them. their shapes looked like boomerangs at first but also appeared circular (too far too tell). their direction changed from horizontal to vertical but again, in the way birds fly together. it was smooth and not jerky. a plane taking off from the direction of the airport was heading through their path when they scattered out of its way, and then they reassembled and continued swirling. i counted around 12 but it was hard to keep track as they all lit up and dimmed at different times. there was no set pattern or path to these lights. i went out on my balcony when i noticed them and tried to take pictures with my phone but they wouldn't show up so i used my dslr on the night setting, which kept the shutter open longer. in the photos i captured you can see the trails of light from the objects above the city. i didn't know how to feel about seeing these objects and tried to google anything they might be but could not find anything remotely similar or 'logical'. i hope that others saw these lights since they swirled for around 2 hours in the same area of the sky.
content.summary: 12 lights swirled around same location over nashville

content.detailedDescription: I watch the skies all the time as i am well aware of things in the sky and have witnessed them on many occasions from my rural home. this at 8:00 pm i sat down to watch the new episode of ancient aliens. during the first commercial break i got up to look out the window as i often do. i had removed the screen from this window for this purpose already. the lights inside where off and only the light from the tv was present in the house. when i looked out to the west there was an especially bright light that isn't normally there,as soon as i noticed it,it began to move in a straight line heading east. i watched with little interest as i've seen these pass over many times before but just as i went to pull my head inside it stopped. so i looked again and it started moving again so i went to my next window to c it carry on east and it didn't appear so i went back to the other window and stuck my head out again and it was right above the house and again soon as my head popped out the window it started to move again   at this point i had a pang of fear run through me so i closed the windows came inside and turned on the lights. it took me a few minutes to remind myself that these things have been around my whole life and haven't bothered me yet. but i thought i would send in a sighting report because there is almost constant activity in my area in the last cpl of years ever since the new gold mine opened. apparently there was a daytime sighting of a disc like craft at the mine sight earlier in the summer as well but many individuals. anyway thanks for being there
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Orb of light passing over again this time appears to be aware of my presence

content.detailedDescription:
Sunset on wednesday, september 27th, 2017, not a single cloud in the sky. i happen to be sitting on a bench next to the hudson river (in poughkeepsie, ny) in deep meditation. when i came out of my meditative state, i was feeling very groggy (never happens). something told me to look up to the left towards the moon. as soon as i looked up i saw a craft coming from the se. but it didn't appear to be coming from a distance. it kind of appeared in the sky. at first, i was pretty sure it was an airplane since it had a flashing white light on it, though i found it strange the flight altitude was much lower than usual for an airplane. as it starts to turn slightly, i start to notice that what i was looking at was not an airplane. the structure had a white flashing light in the back. attached to a fluorescent light green cylindrical center. on one end, there were three squares. one next to the other, and they seemed to extend quite a bit from the craft. very distinguishable. all three squares were a bright, pinkish red. then, as soon as i come to the realization that i'm seeing something i've never seen before, the craft comes to a dead stop! at that moment the craft morphs into a beautiful emerald green fluttering zigzag. it was kind of like a strobe light. i've never seen such brilliantly clear, intense colors! 
when the craft morphed back to it's original shape, i jumped off the bench and started filming.
as soon as i started filming, the craft performed a straight descent then just like a right angle went left on a straight line, in the complete opposite direction. as i started to film, and realizing what was going on i automatically started to send the craft positive thoughts, love and peace. as soon as i had done that, the craft came back in my direction, stopped and flashed three consecutive white lights straight towards me! after this happened things became a bit blurry and i started to feel as if i could sense whoever was on the craft. i kind of became deliriously happy. not afraid, happy. as soon as i snapped out of it, the craft morphed ascended and morphed into the emerald green strobe. then it went back to it's original shape, did a 360 degree turn and steadily, without a single sound headed east until it was out of sight. now, as i had mentioned earlier, i was filming most of this with my iphone. i was holding my iphone about a foot in front of my face, slightly above the horizon with my left eye on the craft and my right eye on my phone so that i could be sure that i was filming everything correctly and catching all of the action. i filmed for at least 3-5 minutes. what happens next just adds to this mystery.
after the craft left, i felt as if some kind of spell was broken. my head was heavy and i was dizzy for a while. kind of like a bad hangover. i walked back over to the bench to sit and to anxiously watch the footage i had taken with my phone. i turn the video on, and all that's on it, is a 15 second video of the ground! i was't filming anywhere near the ground. also, if i was filming the ground, chances are you'd see my feet ir a shadow. nothing. during the video you can hear me breathing very heavily and at the end i let out a strange kind of happy sound from my mouth. friends of mine who have seen the vide, were really freaked by it. how this happened is beyond me! 
i meditate on a daily basis. i am a buddhist and a believer of alien life. for the past two weeks, i've been sending out positive messages of love and light into space hoping that i would receive my first true experience. i'm pretty sure that was it! i can't get it out of my head, and i also have the feeling that i will be seeing the craft again. also, a buddy of mine who has a boat docked in the area where i had my sighting has had quite a few himself.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I was meditating by the hudson river, when i suddenly felt the urge to look up. i noticed, coming from the se was a brilliant, beautifully colored airplan, that was until it  completely stopped in midair without a sound and morphed!

content.detailedDescription: Is in the night sky nearly every night for the past year, since i began noticing it.  seems to change colors and move thru out the night. i want to say, from dust until dawn it is visible, and present.
content.summary: Looks like the biggest star in sky. but is it?

content.detailedDescription:
I drove my friend home from work, as we drove down a country road she asked me if i had seen the orange light on the left. i looked to my left and saw a triangular shaped oranged yellow object. the object seemed far away and strangely we didn´t even thought about taking a picture or something. we drove across the road and suddenly the object was gone, my friend looked out of the right window of my car and the object was appearing againon the right side. i stopped at a parketplace nearby but the object was disappering and we lost it in the trees on the side of the road. 
as we got out of the car we saw a helicopter that made a sharp turn away from where our sighting happend.
content.summary: Orange yellow triangular ufo

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 9pm, sept 29th 2017, i took the 3 dogs ouside to do their buisness, i was having a cigarette on the back deck. at approximately 9:15pm, the 2 older bogs began to bark upwards, towards the bushline(nw), as i live in a forest area, i thought nothing of it at first, until i looked above the tall maple. i seen a very bright white light slowly moving north across the sky, then it made an instant right turn(nnw), traveled that way for a bit, then it made a nother instant turn, but 180° from where it was traveling. then it made one more movement, it continued along the path that it traveling when i first noticed it. it continued to than move in a straight-ish line heading north. it then started getting smaller, turned an orange/red colour and vanished. it wasint a long sighting, but it didnt look or move like a satellite, man made and space debris. ive been noticing more strang night time activity in the sky here, but tonights was the most stunning. i will also note that once the object was almost overhead, the 3 dogs ran onto the deck and began clawing at the patio door to get in the house. i was also on the phone with my boyfriend during the first few minutes of the sighting, but hung up to focus on the object better. i unfortunately wasint able to get a picture or film.
content.summary: Took dogs outside, dogs began barking, looked up and noticed slow moving light

content.detailedDescription: I am in coastal, rural nj. i watch the sky, and pay attention to the natural world around me. i cannot reiterate enough that i know the night sky well, and how it behaves in this and other environments. i have believed in your phenomenon since as long as i remember, and spend more nights than not, watching. yet have never claimed to see one with my own eyes; keeping myself in check, by being my own skeptic.I've seen strange things, but always can rationalize myself out if it. that said, just wanted to pass this along to you guys, for your research. not much to report, but saw a brilliant star, shining exceptionally bright and dazzling colors, like a diamond in the sky... i cannot confirm, but it may have had some directional change(s), as initially, i had the impression it was coming towards me (upon realizing it was not a star. yet once i grabbed my small telescope, watched it creep across a small section of sky in a 20-25 minute period, seemingly in a straight line towards the name northwest. i found it interesting that i could go out if focus in both directions. not a plane, not a copter, no perceivable noise from my vantage point. probably larger than a plane, but difficult for me to tell.  i'd expect you get more reports on this soon...
content.summary: Diamond like; brilliantcolors! very slow, first mistook for star. observed with telescooe over 20 mins. unique to this skywatcher!

content.detailedDescription:
1 and 2.  i was in the house watching tv when my mother was on the back deck and called me out to look at this strange object in the sky.

3.  a shooting star.

4. a bright pulsating light that appeared to be scanning.  it changed direction on a dime and ascended and decended rapidly.  it changed red, green and yellow.  

5.  three people were watching it.  none of us were willing to use the words ufo.  after a few minutes of watching this, we simply couldn't describe it any other way.  none of us are ufo conspiracy types but this was undeniable.

6.  it disappeared in a matter of 2 seconds.
content.summary: Bright pulsating lights.  seemed to be scanning.  erratically changed direction on a dime.  could not have been an airplane.

content.detailedDescription: at approximately 930 last night. i saw lights in the north east sky.  the sky was partly cloudy.  i held out my hand and they were about the size of my thumbnail.  they were white with maybe a slight tinge of blue. they were all the same size and same brightness.  they were brighter in the center and faded towards their edges.  they were moving quickly in a regular pattern with 180° instantaneous direction reversals. some were tracking the same path, and others had individual paths.  they were only visible when they had a cloud pattern behind them. when they passed  through clear sections of sky, they were invisible.  this  continued for 5 to 10 minutes, and then in an instant, they all merged into a triangular pattern with three lights only. they stay this way for about 10 minutes and then resumed the  traveling patterns. after another 10 minutes or so, they resumed the triangle formation.  one or two of these lights would flash on and off rapidly while traveling.  after another 10 minutes, they begin the traveling  patterned and then, in an instant, united as one  lyte, this time in a completely different location. whenever they stop their movement, they united always at the edge of a cloud, imperceptible if you were not looking for them. the incident lasted for at least 30 minutes. at their final resting place at the edge of a cloud they slowly faded away over about 15 seconds.  by the way, at one point i went inside to get my phone to video them, came out, held up the phone to the sky and they completely disappeared. i said out loud, "ok, i'm shutting off my phone and i will not videotape you." after about five minutes they reappeared.
content.summary: almost a dozen lights traveling across the sky individually then zapping into a triangular position

content.detailedDescription: Several circular objects flying together in a formation paused, hovered, and then rapidly accelerated and disappeared.
content.summary: Round circular flying objects in a formation

content.detailedDescription: Several circular objects flying together in a formation paused, hovered, and then rapidly accelerated and disappeared.
content.summary: Round circular flying objects in a formation

content.detailedDescription: Little black circles
content.summary: Little black circles similar to when you take the illegal drug mushrroms

content.detailedDescription: Crystal clear evening outside my house having a cigarette. no exterior lights on so i could better view the stars. straight above i viewed what i thought was a fast moving satellite (1st light) then saw another (2nd light) traveling same approximate speed directly at one another as if about to collide. 2nd light (moving south east) stopped and turned abruptly to the north for a short distance as a 3rd light faded in and then out very close to 2nd light. 2nd light seemed to be reacting to 3rd light as if to repel or to obstruct it making it fade away. i dont know what was going on other than they seemed to be reacting to one another.1st light kept traveling northwest and disappeared or i simply lost track of it as i focused on the 3rd lights behavior in fading away. 2nd light remained motionless and appeared to be starlike other than a reddish pink translucent color shown to its right and a bright almost led bright white shown to it left. watched it for a half hour before my feet got cold and decided to go in. took 4 pictures fully zoomed with no flash
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Total of 3 lights. moving faster than i've seen satellites move but not by alot

content.detailedDescription:
On this occasion, i thought i was filming three separate lights within minutes apart. once i uploaded the videos from my professional dslr camera, i noticed two pairs of lights on the last two recordings. i have pieced all three recordings together in a short video, and i have the original files as proof that the recordings are not altered in any way.

every night i see at least one of these star-like lights pass over or near my house. sometimes they can be seen traveling from horizon to horizon. other times they just suddenly appear or suddenly disappear. sometimes they move in a straight line, and sometimes they change direction, hover slightly, or wobble in flight. they appear at various altitudes, i'm assuming, though they appear to be above the clouds. one light was so bright that it illuminated the clouds as it passed over them. i live in an area with commercial jet traffic, and most of my sightings are witnessed before or after heavy jet traffic. these lights are not jets, helicopters, satellites, meteors, toy drones, chinese lanterns, fireflies, or anything that occurs naturally. they are silent, have no strobes, and often travel at various speeds.
content.summary: Unknown white lights above my house

content.detailedDescription: On 9/29/17, our neighbor called us outside to determine what was hovering in the sky. it is about 10:40 am. we counted 30 or more bright white things in the sky appearing to hover and very slowly descending ( getting slightly larger). position was nw ranging from 60 to 90 degrees. not a single cloud in the sky. minutes later they appeared to be moving higher and more to the west. then two military looking jet aircraft flew under them, helping us  identifying them as being much higher than they first appeared. it seamed that within just a few minutes after that they quickly got higher and much less in numbers. finally after about 10 minutes total the last four where straight west and about 90 degrees before we lost sight at about 10:55 am.
content.summary: Observed about 30 steady, white, bright lights high in the sky, for about 15-20 minutes.

content.detailedDescription: I was out with friends and i saw something blinking, i thought it was a plane but then my friends started thinking about other stuff, like scary stuff and that's how we got the idea of seeing a ufo.It was a fidget spinner kind of perimiter, it had blue and red blinking lights and the 3rd hole was greyish.We were all scared which made us go home early, no one wanted to be outside anymore and one of my friends began to cry. the object went past a building, couldnt see it anymore.
content.summary: Creepy, made my friends cry, wanted me to go home straight away, but i couldnt leave my friends

content.detailedDescription: In the early hours of 10/12/17 in big sky and south of fiji there will be a display like never before. this will be the begining of contact. bring cameras and telescopes and share with the world. this will be only notice from me. plus 30 days from 9/12/17. event date 10/12/17
content.summary: Display of several different craft

content.detailedDescription:
I am afraid, and curious. first began noticing last october in my back yard. all night observation, slowly moves seemingly on a path. now it appears in my front of house. disappears as the sun comes up. husband says they change colors and appear to wobble before taking off. just vanish. i purchased a telescope, receive it in august, i am finally going to be brave and record anything i capture. which i will because this has become such a permanent fixture in my night sky.  i will report back tomorrow, and i also have another incident to report. also just to make mention, my home is surrounded by a bunch of missle silows and of course oil wells. i don't know if this plays a part. the other night i heard what sounded like quit a few helicopters. woke me from a sound sleep. i didn't look, because again, i have a lot of fear.  i promise to be strong and report back, i will have a video recording.
sincerly,
nicole
content.summary: Two apper in sky look like two bright stars, brightest i ever saw in my whole life!

content.detailedDescription:
On august 21, 2017 we were in sweetwater, tn to observe the total solar eclipse. latitude 35.60n longitude 84.47w. the eclipse started around 2:30pm.
i took off my eclipse glasses and started to video tape the eclipse on my cell phone.  my video lasted 108 seconds (1:48).

i was in a park between monroe st, s. high st. and s. price st watching the eclipse with my family. i was shooting throught a clearing between trees. i had a clear view of the eclipse. you can see birds flying over and you can hear me talking to my son during the video.

 at about 65 seconds into the video a white dot appeared. it started moving around in different directions. it looked like it was moving toward the earth.

at the end of the video when the sun and moon started to separate, there was a starburst on the two sides of the eclipse. the white dot had a glow around it. maybe the sun was reflecting off the backside of it. the glow expanded and shows as a pink inside and a blue area around.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: While shooting video of total eclipse around 2p:30, saw a small white object in the viewfinder. flight path changed directions, got larger, had a glow around it.

content.detailedDescription: Le 23 09 2017 vers 22h15, de ma maison au sud d'amiens(somme-france), ã  l'ouest, de ma maison mon regard a ete attire au loin par de fortes lumiã¨res rouges.A la fenetre ouest, faisantle tri avec les lumiã¨res du village, je me suis rendu ã  l'evidence, 7 boules rouges tres vif,avec un phenomene d'amplitude comme un phare maritime, etaient visibles ã  5 kms, en dessous des nuages, dans une disoisition  inverse de celle de la grande ourse ã  cette saison,ni meteore, ni etoile filante,au bout de 5 mns 6 se sont effacã©es, la septieme partant en ligne droite vers le sud, de nombreux avions sont passes ce soir lã , leurs feux etant ridicules comparativement en intensitã©, hauteur en dessous des nuages et inferieure au trafic aerien
content.summary: Lumieres rouges intenses a l'ouest de la somme picardie france sur d'amiens

content.detailedDescription:
My sighting occurred at approximately 10:00 to 10:10 in the evening of sep 28th, 2017. i live in a rural area approximately 20 miles northeast of raleigh, nc near the town of wake forest. my daughter had been over for dinner and as she was getting ready to leave i escorted her outside to her car. we were standing outside carrying on a conversation when, in the distance, i heard the approaching sound of a helicopter. as i looked toward the sound i see the lights of the helicopter approaching. and by the way they were blue. i would say first off that often it is hard to discern how far away an object is in the sky. sometimes objects are farther away than they might initially appear. but i could clearly see the helicopter and it was facing broadside to me as we were watching it. and at this point the helicopter was hovering---i'd say perhaps for maybe twenty seconds or so. it then began to turn to the right towards our position and began to accelerate very rapidly. i would also note that the helicopter seemed to be a rather large, twin rotor aircraft. my sense was that it was military. and i could plainly see blue lights both fore and aft on the helicopter. one thing that struck me was that the helicopter was flying extremely fast for something with rotors.
  but as the helicopter passed by us i exclaimed to my daughter, " that helicopter is chasing something. 
  so, my best observation of what i saw was something like a yellow round, faintly glowing orb or ball way out in front of the helicopter that it was trying to catch up to. and as we were following the helicopter going by us left to right we could see the moon in the distance.And only because at that moment the moon was lighting the sky could we see what the helicopter was chasing-----a massive black craft or, rather, what i would describe as an oval shaped craft much larger than a commercial airliner, perhaps the size of two thirds of a football field. the craft was not completely round but more of an oval shape. we could clearly see it although the sighting lasted only four or five seconds. there were no wings and absolutely no sound from it, the only sound being from the helicopter. i would estimate the helicopter was four to five hundred yards behind the craft.
  here's another observation, really just a gut feeling that the helicopter was chasing the craft as opposed to escorting it. i don't know why but that's just the sense i had. i think probably because they were both traveling at such a high rate of speed
content.summary: I saw a helicopter chasing a round or rather oval craft that was massive in size matte black in color

content.detailedDescription: Working on a ac unit on the roof  of a midrise in downtown phoenix  my coworker aid whats that when i looked i saw 3 dots ( orbs ) coming over  squaw peak  the west of it heading south  , at 1st we though helicopters  working on this roof i see  planes and copters all the time  and this was not one , when they got closer we noticed they were  not copters but reflecting dots that stoped and began to move west and assumed a triangle position and gaining altitude , while gaining altitude  they made no sound had no lights but i believe they may have been faceted they way they randomly reflected lights   they  began to straighten out to a linear form then proceed north northwest back the way they came  and disappeared into the distance  total time was under 45 minutes
content.summary: 3 orbs went to triangle formation then back to linear and disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I was terrified  and scared i didn't know what to do
content.summary: So creepy and scary

content.detailedDescription: I thought meteor but then realized what looked like flames were green not orange and red and i could see a perfect circle outlined inside of the green flame descending at quite high speed straight north.
content.summary: something made me look straight up perfectly round circle with light green flame all around it and trailing it heading in a descent north.
